body_html: It's strange that it works well in my PC--which the path is /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages--but occur errors in my workshop computer with the same path. After I set the target path as /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages, this problem is gone. Now my tensorflow works well, thank you very much! @yselivonchyk
body_text: It's strange that it works well in my PC--which the path is /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages--but occur errors in my workshop computer with the same path. After I set the target path as /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages, this problem is gone. Now my tensorflow works well, thank you very much! @yselivonchyk
body: It's strange that it works well in my PC--which the path is `/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages`--but occur errors in my workshop computer with the same path. After I set the target path as `/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages`, this problem is gone. Now my tensorflow works well, thank you very much! @yselivonchyk
